div.div:
1) prepares list of routes in ./pages-map
2) and exposes all pages

1) Init new MFClient()
2) patch getPageList() method in
next/dist/client/page-loader.js
3) imports nextjs-mf/lib/include-defaults

Adds PublicPath of remote host
to assets

Adds PublicPath of remote host
to assets
In DEV mode blocks page reloading for federated routes

emits remoteEntry.js
with exposed and shared modules
